#summary Front page of the project

= About =

*!SymWiki* is a personal Wiki application for Symbian S60 devices. It is supports a subset of emacs-wiki syntax.

It is written in Python for S60, so it runs on every platform where Pys60 runs.

= Download & Installation =

The project just started. No distros available. You can get source code, put it to your S60 smartphone and try it there.
